CustomField.description: The time in milliseconds before the token expires. A scheduled job will update the token every 24 hours so the expiration time will be set ~48 hours to ensure there is always a valid token.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The time in milliseconds before the token expires. A scheduled job will update the token every 24 hours so the expiration time will be set ~48 hours to ensure there is always a valid token.
CustomField.label: Token Expiration Time
